pages.title: Fluid Injector
pages.text: The <item>Fluid Injector/$ is an automated way to convert between fluids and liquid-phase <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)alchemy reagents/$. It connects to a fluid pipe on the top and a <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/conduit)alchemy conduit/$ on the bottom. It can convert in either direction, and 1 unit of <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)alchemy reagent/$ is worth more than 1mB of fluid. Added <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ will be added
at a temperature it would be liquid at.$(br2)

Only certain <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ and fluids can be converted- most <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)reagents/$ have no liquid associated with it.$(br2)100mB $(l:essentials:intro/fluid)distilled water/$ <-> <item>water/$$(br2)16mB $(l:essentials:intro/fluid)molten iron/$ <-> <item>iron/$ (1 unit = 1 nugget)$(br2)16mB $(l:essentials:intro/fluid)molten gold/$ <-> <item>gold/$ (1 unit = 1 nugget)$(br2)
16mB $(l:essentials:intro/fluid)molten copper/$ <-> <item>copper/$ (1 unit = 1 nugget)$(br2)16mB $(l:essentials:intro/fluid)molten tin/$ <-> <item>tin/$ (1 unit = 1 nugget)$(br2)
